text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher iraisonablem Preis zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"1) Closed the missing </BIBL> tag after the segment ending with 'samtl. in 4to.' so that the Mohemii item forms a valid BIBL block.
2) Changed malformed size indicators '4t√≤' and '8v√≤' to normalized bibliographical abbreviations '4to' and '8vo' inside the FORMAT tags.
3) Replaced mojibake sequences in 'B√ºcher' and 'Prei√ü' with the correct German words 'Bücher' and 'Preis'.
4) Escaped ampersands as '&' within text content inside TITLE elements to maintain well-formed XML.
5) Ensured all BIBL elements are properly opened and closed and that nesting of AUTHOR, TITLE, YEAR, VOLUME, and FORMAT tags is structurally consistent throughout the ITEM."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher iraisonablem Preis zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>.</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Closed the missing </BIBL> tag after the segment ending with 'samtl. in 4to.' so that the Mohemii item forms a valid BIBL block.
2) Changed malformed size indicators '4t√≤' and '8v√≤' to normalized bibliographical abbreviations '4to' and '8vo' inside the FORMAT tags.
3) Replaced mojibake sequences in 'B√ºcher' and 'Prei√ü' with the correct German words 'Bücher' and 'Preis'.
4) Escaped ampersands as '&' within text content inside TITLE elements to maintain well-formed XML.
5) Ensured all BIBL elements are properly opened and closed and that nesting of AUTHOR, TITLE, YEAR, VOLUME, and FORMAT tags is structurally consistent throughout the ITEM.
